definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prob. (si vera 1.) help (Aram. loan-word, Syr. 9dar Targum [[עֲדַר]] (rare) = Heb. [[עזר]] q.v.; > Thes, assuming mng. arrange, order);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לַעֲדׂר]] 1Ch 12:34 (Baer Ginsb; van d. H. v:33; this mng. also LXX Vulgate); but < Codd. [[לַעֲוֹר]] (cf. v:1Ch 12:18, v:1Ch 12:22, v:1Ch 12:23, van d. H. v:17, v:21, v:22), so Kau Buhl; Pt. pl. cstr. [[עׂדְרֵי מַעֲרָכָה]] v:39 (van d. H. v:38), rd. [[עׂרְכֵי]] (q.v. v:34) LXX Kau; see [[ערך]].
